txt.en: 'You have helped us enough, little friend, and you have the thanks of our tribe. I know that the Men-folk, these Rangers, must need your help again. I see them looking out with their watchful eyes.'
'You have come to aid me? That is well! I have many fears tugging at my mind today.'
Esteldín employs a number of scouts who cast their eyes far beyond the walls of the refuge.
Melthindir, a watcher of Esteldín, can be found at the eastern entrance to Esteldín.\n\nYou should offer your aid to Melthindir.
